title: Sammy Merza
text:
Sammy Merza (born August 10, 1976 in <a href="Damascus">Damascus</a>, <a href="Syria">Syria</a>) is an <a href="Assyrian/Chaldean/Syriac%20Americans">Assyrian American</a> retired professional <a href="Boxing">boxer</a> from <a href="Chicago">Chicago</a>, <a href="Illinois">Illinois</a>.
He started boxing at the age of 10 and competed his first professional fight at the age of 22. He holds a record of 16-1 (12 KO's).
